src_original: 24.1 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ā(nandam āmantra)yate //  ta ānanda bhi(kṣubhiḥ)  sūtrāntapratisaraṇair bhavitavyaṃ na pudgala(p)
tgt_original: 「從今日後，依修多羅，莫依人。 」阿難云：

src_original: 24.4 ihān(a)nda bhikṣur āgacch(et sa evaṃ) vadet //
24.5 saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato 'ntikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukh(am udgṛhītam ayaṃ dha)  rmo 'yaṃ vinaya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam //  24.6 t(asya bhikṣavas tan)
tgt_original: 「我現從佛聞，現從佛受，是法是善，是佛所教。

src_original: notsāhayit(a)  vyaṃ nāvasādayitavyam //  anutsāhayitvānavasādayitvā śrotram avadhā(ya tāni pa)  davyaṃjanāny udgṛhya sūtre 'vatār(ayitavyaṃ vina) y(e)  saṃdarśayitavyaṃ //
tgt_original: 」是比丘語，莫受、莫捨，審諦聽已，應以經律撿其所說。

src_original: yadi sūtr(e) 'vatāryamāṇā vinaye saṃdarśyamānāḥ sūtre nāvataran(ti vinaye)  na saṃdṛśyante dharmatāṃ ca vilomayanti (sa eva)
tgt_original: 若不入修多羅，不入毘尼，又復違逆諸法相義，應報是比丘言：

src_original: ṃ syād vacanīyaḥ //  sūtre nāvataranti vinaye na saṃdṛśyante dharmatāṃ ca vilomayanti //  24.8 nāyaṃ dharmo nāyaṃ vi(nayo nedaṃ śās)  tuḥ śāsanam iti viditvā chorayitavyāḥ //  24.9 puna(r apa)ram (ānanda)
tgt_original: 「是法或非佛所說，或長老謬受。

src_original: yadi sūtre 'vatāryamāṇā vinaye saṃdarśyamānāḥ sūtre nāvataranti vinaye na saṃ)  dṛśyante dharmatāṃ ca vilomayanti sa evaṃ syād va(canīyaḥ //)  24.13 (addhāyuṣmaṃs tena mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena dharmasaṃjñinā ca vinayasaṃjñinā cādharmaś cāvinaya)  ś ca bhāṣitaḥ //  āyuṣmatā vā ime dharmā durgṛ(hītās tathā hīme dharmāḥ sūtre 'vatāryamāṇā vinaye saṃdarśyamānāḥ sūtre nāvataranti vinaye na saṃdṛśyante dharma)  tāṃ ca vilomayanti //  24.14 nāyaṃ dharmo nāyaṃ vinayo (nedaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam iti viditvā chorayitavyāḥ //)  24.15 (punar aparam ānanda bhikṣur āgacchet sa evaṃ vadet //)
tgt_original: 是法不入修多羅、不入毘尼，又復違逆諸法相義；

src_original: 24.22 amuṣminn āvāse (bhikṣuḥ prativasati sthaviraḥ ..............) (= 24.45)  24.23 (saṃ)mukhaṃ me tasya bhikṣor antikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukha(m udgṛhītam ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinaya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ //)
tgt_original: 「彼住處有大眾，有明經上座，善說戒律。 我現從彼聞，現從彼受。

src_original: nāvasādayitavyam //  anutsāhayitvānavasā(dayitvā śrotram avadhāya tāni padavyañjanāny udgṛhya sūtre 'vatārayitavyaṃ vinaye sandarśayi)tavyaṃ //  yadi sūtre 'vat(ā)  ryamā(ṇā vina)
tgt_original: 」是比丘語，莫受、莫捨，審諦聽已，應以經律撿其所說。

src_original: ye sandarśy(amā)  nāḥ sūtre '(vataranti vinaye saṃdṛśyante dharmatāṃ ca na vilomayanti sa evaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ //)
tgt_original: 若不入修多羅，不入毘尼，又復違逆諸法相義，應報是比丘言：

src_original: 24.31 ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vi(naya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam iti viditvā dhārayitavyāḥ //)  24.32 (punar aparam ānanda bhikṣur āgacchet sa) evaṃ vadet //  24.33 amuṣminn āvāse mahān bhikṣusaṃghaḥ prati(va)
tgt_original: 彼比丘僧法相、善相，或作非法、非善說；

src_original: inātra dharmaś ca vinayaś ca (bhāṣitaḥ //  āyuṣmatā) ce(me dharmāḥ sugṛhītās tathā hīme dharmāḥ sūtre 'vatāryamāṇā vinaye saṃdarśyamānāḥ sūtre 'vataranti vinaye na saṃd)  ṛśy(ante)  dharmatāñ ca na vi(lomayanti //)
tgt_original: 是法不入修多羅，不入毘尼，又復違逆諸法相義；

src_original: 24.37 (ayaṃ dharmo)  'yaṃ vi(naya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam iti viditvā dhārayitavyāḥ //)
tgt_original: 是則非法，非善、非佛所教； 如是知已，即應除却。

src_original: 24.38 (punar aparam ānanda bhikṣur āgacchet sa evaṃ vadet //)()
